title: 有馬記念の後に・レースに勝って……

text.jpText:
『有馬記念』を制したヒシアマゾン。
しかし人々は“怪物”ナリタブライアンの
驚異的な走りに目を奪われていた……。
text.enText:
Hsiamazon won the Arima Kinen. However, 
people were blinded by the amazing run of the 
"monster" NARITABURIAN. However, people were 
blinded by the amazing run of the "monster" 
Nalitabu Ryan. ……

text.jpText:
レースには勝ったがタイマンには負けた……。
そう感じたヒシアマゾンは来年の有馬記念で
ナリタブライアンにリベンジすることを誓う。
text.enText:
She won the race but lost the tie.…… 
Hsiamazon felt this way and vowed to take 
revenge on Nalitabu Ryan at next year's 
Arimakinen. She vows to take revenge on 
Narita Bryan at next year's Arimakinen.

text.jpText:
ヒシアマゾンはトレーナーと話し合い、
次の目標を『大阪杯』に決める。
ただし、目指すは1着のみだ……！
text.enText:
Hsiamazon talks with her trainer and decides 
on "Osaka Cup" as her next target. However, 
she is aiming for first place only. ……!
